assertions.assertion: The function hthread_cond_init() shall initialize the condition variable referenced by cond with attributes referenced by attr. Upon successful initialization, the state of the condition variable shall become initialized. Since there is only one element in a cond variable, only the cond number is tested.
The function hthread_cond_init() shall initialize the condition variable referenced by cond with attributeds referenced by attr. If attr is NULL, then default attributes will be assigned.
If successful, the hthread_cond_init() function shall return zero;
